author: N/A
message:
{"type":"deployment","sha":"1c808126903ecda007d29a009224a7cf2a2c278a","repoName":"amb-emilb/workbook-teams-bot","actor":"amb-emilb","slotName":"production","commitMessage":"Add comprehensive debug logging to isolate bot hanging issue

- Add detailed startup logging with timestamps and process info
- Add extensive message endpoint logging to trace execution path
- Temporarily disable file storage initialization and routes
- Remove all file-related imports to eliminate dependencies
- Add logging to every step of Teams AI processing pipeline

This will help identify exactly where the bot is hanging:
- Server initialization phase
- Teams bot creation phase
- Message endpoint registration
- Teams AI adapter processing
- Bot message handling

All components except core Teams messaging are disabled."}

author: N/A
message:
{"type":"deployment","sha":"5b119bbcbf8deddb5d7a84a2c80ae5918d45fbda","repoName":"amb-emilb/workbook-teams-bot","actor":"amb-emilb","slotName":"production","commitMessage":"Temporarily disable Adaptive Cards to diagnose bot hanging issue

- Remove all Adaptive Cards imports and functionality
- Keep plain text responses only
- Add logging to confirm cards are disabled
- Fix TypeScript and lint errors

This will help confirm if Adaptive Cards were causing the 503 errors
and message endpoint timeouts. If bot works now, we know the issue
is in the Adaptive Cards implementation."}

author: N/A
message:
{"type":"deployment","sha":"c1ae488582021ab9f615900e6cecc36d47b10f7a","repoName":"amb-emilb/workbook-teams-bot","actor":"amb-emilb","slotName":"production","commitMessage":"Feat: Implement rich Adaptive Cards for enhanced Teams user experience

- Add comprehensive Adaptive Card templates for 5 response types
- Implement smart response parsing to detect card opportunities
- Create interactive company/contact result cards with action buttons
- Add visual data quality cards with progress bars and metrics
- Build download cards with file information and action buttons
- Add enhanced status cards with icons and color coding
- Implement card action handlers for company details and exports
- Add automatic fallback to plain text for compatibility
- Create comprehensive test suite with 100% pass rate (6/6 tests)
- Update implementation guide to reflect Adaptive Cards completion

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>"}

message:
{"type":"deployment","sha":"5803f61fa38eacf5493190d49788cf8da4851db4","repoName":"amb-emilb/workbook-teams-bot","actor":"amb-emilb","slotName":"production","commitMessage":"Bridge Teams user metadata to Mastra conversation context

- Add user name from Teams context to Mastra agent messages
- Enable bot to know user's actual name for personalized responses
- Support future proactive notifications requiring user names
- Format: [User Context: DisplayName (resourceId)] original message
- Prepares foundation for "Emil, you're missing time registrations" type messages

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>"}

{"type":"deployment","sha":"39e44a18013c2b3795e9ba0bf29173b47a0ca5f3","repoName":"amb-emilb/workbook-teams-bot","actor":"amb-emilb","slotName":"production","commitMessage":"Fix: Isolate test configuration to prevent production interference

- Restrict TEST_MODE usage to explicit test environment (NODE_ENV=test)
- Prevent test configuration from affecting production Workbook API calls
- Ensure production environment uses standard workbook-memory.db path

author: N/A
message:
{"type":"deployment","sha":"b240748cb295b05cca835f559a6238289bfa10e3","repoName":"amb-emilb/workbook-teams-bot","actor":"amb-emilb","slotName":"production","commitMessage":"Fix PostgreSQL memory initialization race condition and implement hybrid testing environment

- Add singleton pattern to prevent concurrent agent initialization
- Implement graceful PostgreSQL error handling for index conflicts
- Add production-safe retry logic with random delays
- Support hybrid configuration (Azure prod runtime + dev Workbook API)
- Add WORKBOOK_ENV variable for independent API environment control
- Fix Enhanced Export Tool field validation (Company -> ResourceFolder)
- Create comprehensive tool documentation for testing (12 tools across 4 categories)
- Improve environment detection logging and consistency

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>"}
